name: Kolkata Sanjog Initiatives
briefDescription: Based in Kolkata, India, Sanjog is a technical resource organization, registered as a society, and works on protection and empowerment of children and adolescents, prevention of abuse of children in families, communities, institutions and through organized crime. Behind all Sanjog initiatives are a growing group of committed professionals from various sectors - mental health, social business development, research, child protection specialists, communication and media. Through research, development and training, Sanjog builds grassroots organizationsâ€™ capacities in research, programming and advocacy, programme and project management and organizational development.
